title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A close member of your inner circle may confide in you about a touchy subject today. You likely become part-detective and part-counselor for a relative or friend as they discuss an issue that stirs up a plethora of feelings. Its perfectly acceptable to admit that youre not entirely clear on the best strategy for moving forward now. Perhaps you both need to contemplate the options and sleep on it overnight. You can always suggest consulting with a professional if things still seem overwhelming in the morning light. Stay emotionally present and offer a non-judgmental shoulder for support. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
